law.catch_line: The Board may reinstate the license of any individual whose license has been suspended or revoked un...

text.section:
The Board may reinstate the license of any individual whose license has been suspended or revoked under this title only in accordance with:
The terms and conditions of the order of suspension or revocation;
A final judgment in any proceeding for review; or
Subsection (b) of this section.
If the license was revoked under § 16-311(b) of this subtitle for practicing with a suspended license, it may be reinstated at the discretion of the Board.
